short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transport you straight back to the good old days by replacing all instances of 'Account engagement' with the classic term 'Pardot'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Pardot Nostalgia Extension for the Salesforce Pardot Lightning App! 

Tired of seeing name Account Engagement?

Well, say hello to the good old days with this extension that will replace Account Engagement with Pardot in every instance. 

Get ready to relive the memories and embrace the nostalgia of the original name! 

So sit back, relax, and let the waves of nostalgia wash over you as you browse Pardot.

Upgrade your Salesforce experience with a touch of humor and a hint of history. 

Download now and never miss a beat with Pardot!
